name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, Appellee v. 300 NORTH BROAD STREET, LTD., a/k/a/ 300 North Broad Street, a Partnership, a/k/a 300 North Partnership, a/k/a 300 North Broad Street Trust, and Heywood Becker, Appellants

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of November, 2008, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
